description:
The Dengeki Bracelet Set brings 5 Bracelets that can be equipped by your favorite Neptunia cast! Each item gives various boosts to stats that'll help lead your party to victory!

The Dengeki Bracelet Set includes:
• Dengeki Gloves: All party members
• Dengeki Bracelet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Dengeki Armlet: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa
• Dengeki Wristband: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa
• Dengeki Gauntlet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF

*Note: Bracelets are not visible during battle or cutscenes.
name: Dengeki Bracelet Set
